<h1 align="center">
  Barcadia V2 Starter - WordPress Mashup
</h1>

- To begin: take this GatsbyJS starter theme, and transplant WordPress in place of Contentful.
- Long haul: Perhaps a complete re-style and hack and slash... who knows?
